column1: 10 pts - Great job identifying the production function as a candidate for scrum/sprint methodologies and providing specific details on how it could operate. Keep up the good work!
12 pts - Very complete and clear description of how scrum/sprint could operate. Great job explaining the benefits and application of scrum/sprint in the production function. Keep up the good work!

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit.

Comment: Good attempt at explaining the poor fit of kanban for the chosen function, but could be more specific and detailed in your explanation. Keep up the good work!

10/10 - Great job identifying the marketing function as a potential area to benefit from kanban methodologies and providing a detailed explanation of how it could be implemented. Keep up the good work!
12 pts - Very complete and clear description of how kanban could operate. Great job on providing specific details and examples for the marketing function. Keep up the good work!

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit.

Comment: Good effort in explaining the benefits of scrum/sprint for production, but the discussion on why it's a poor fit for marketing could be more specific and clear. Keep up the good work!

5 pts - Selected bias is clearly relevant to this situation.

Great job identifying confirmation bias as a potential issue in the decision-making process. Keep up the good work!

10/10 - Excellent job defining confirmation bias and providing a clear example of how it could impact the decision-making process. Your suggestion to seek diverse perspectives is a valuable step to avoid this bias. Keep up the great work!
12 pts - Complete and clear description of possible problem. Great job in identifying and explaining the potential cognitive bias and its impact on decision-making. Keep up the good work!

10/10

Great job! Your descriptions of possible steps and actions for implementing agile methodologies are clear and detailed. Keep up the excellent work!
